body:
ok so I gave one my Alts to a friend named TheSaltIsReal. they apparently can't log in, so I am saying this for them. If anyone wants to friend or something where they have to log in to da website, plz be calm and patient, for they can't. 

They said that it said to log one with a person like 28191jsjwqoqp or something alike. staff pease ficks
